price: (102) And those whose scales are heavy [with good deeds] - it is they who are the successful.
arabic: فَمَن ثَقُلَتۡ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: faman thaqulat mawāzīnuhu fa-ulāika humu al-muf'liḥūna
